reviewText: I purchased the item for a friend of mine and my friend loved it and said that is very satisfied
Every teacher should own this video. Keep it under lock and key though. Other teachers are thieves.

The speeches are really superb ones.  They are abridged, which makes them perfect for a Social Studies class.  Naturally, some of the video and audio is less than great, since they were recorded some time ago, but that is more than made up for by the content.

This is a wonderful selection of great speeches. However, beware they are not all complete. The  Martin Luther King "I Have a Dream" speech  skips the critical beginning paragraphs. That alone is reason to pass on this CD.
Not at all impressive...  Just recorded few lines in each speech... clarity of audio is OK...... I suggest you not to buy this.
